bill_title: make an appropriation to the Board of Regents to match the maintenance and repair funds generated by student tuition and fee payments deposited in the higher education facilities fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to the Board of Regents to match the maintenance and repair funds generated by student tuition and fee payments deposited in the higher education facilities fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of one million six hundred thirty-eight thousand eight hundred ninety-seven dollars ($ 1,638,897 ), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents to match student tuition and fee payments deposited in the higher education facilities fund for the maintenance and repair of existing academic facilities pursuant to subdivision 13-51-2(2) and § 13-53-15. Section 2. Funds appropriated by this Act are to be expended for such purposes and projects as have been authorized pursuant to subdivision 13-51-2(2).

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
